rooms.description: A welcoming space with Bohemian decor featuring local materials and handcrafted art pieces.
Spacious area for relaxation and social gatherings, integrating vibrant textiles, eclectic furniture, and artistic installations.
A cozy dining space with wooden decor and Bohemian accents, perfect for family meals.
Modern kitchen design incorporating Vastu principles such as east-facing windows to welcome positive energy; uses local stone and wood finishes.
A serene master bedroom with Bohemian-inspired decor, east or north facing for auspicious alignment, with natural light and ventilation.
Comfortable guest room designed with Bohemian textiles and a harmonious color palette that adheres to Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated entertainment area featuring ambient lighting and soundproofing for immersive experiences; positioned as per Vastu recommendations in the north-west zone.
Space for storage and utility purposes, designed with local materials and sustainable practices.

openings.description: Sturdy door positioned in the north-facing wall as per Vastu norms, leading to a shaded entrance area.
Access point from living space to swimming pool area; oriented for ease of movement and safety.
Entrance connecting the garden and pool area with natural light and ventilation.
